Support Competitive US Races

One of the most effective ways to protect immigrant rights and defeat anti-immigrant policies is to help elect leaders who will fight for justice. You can make a difference by funding competitive races and joining postcard writing and calling campaigns.

How You Can Help

  • Urgent actions and funding opportunities for federal races (Turn Purple 2 Blue)
  • Find in-person postcard writing campaigns (Mobilize)
  • Join virtual campaign actions (Mobilize)
  • Volunteer for phone banking (Mobilize)
  • Get Out the Vote campaigns (Mobilize)

Track Races and Accountability

  • How Massachusetts legislators have voted (Progressive Mass Scorecard)
  • Competitive House races (Cook Political Report)
  • Competitive Senate races (Cook Political Report)

Your support—whether financial or through volunteering—can help tip the balance in key races and ensure a better future for all.
